net.pandoragames.far.ui

Interface ReplacementDescriptor

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, ContentFilter
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ReplaceForm

    public interface ReplacementDescriptor
extends ContentFilter
    Data for a replacement operation.
    Author:
    Olivier Wehner

    • Method Summary

      ReplacementDescriptor clone()

      Returns the backup directory.

    • Method Detail

      • isDoBackup

        boolean isDoBackup()
        Returns the doBackup flag. Note that the application may choose to create temporary backups, even if this flag is set to false, in order to allow undo operations.
        Returns:
        whether backups should be created or not
        See Also:
        FileMatcher.isDoBackup()

      • getBackupDirectory

        java.io.File getBackupDirectory()
        Returns the backup directory.
        Returns:
        backup directory if any
        See Also:
        FileMatcher.setBackUpDirectory(File)

      • getReplacementString

        java.lang.String getReplacementString()
        Returns the raw replacement string as specified by the user.
        Returns:
        replacement string, possibly empty, never null

      • getReplacementPattern

        ReplacementString getReplacementPattern(java.lang.String lineBreak)
        Returns the replacement string as a ReplacementString object.
        Parameters:
        lineBreak - the lineBreak to be used, if null the system dependent line separator will be used
        Returns:
        ReplacementString object or null if no replacement is defined.

      • getBaseDirectory

        java.io.File getBaseDirectory()
        Returns the base directory, if any. This attribute is used for the creation of back ups. All files subject to a replacement operation should share the same common base directory. Alternatively, this attribute should be set to null, or the doBackup flag should be set to false.
        Returns:
        base directory for the resolution of relative pathes during backup operations.
        See Also:
        FileMatcher.setBaseDirectory(File)

      • clone

        ReplacementDescriptor clone()
        Returns a copy of this object, with all interface method behaving exactly as the original instance.
        Specified by:
        clone in interface ContentFilter
        Returns:
        copy of this object.
